title: Podcast ideas
author: VD
content_html:
I’m really not enamored of the serious one-man podcasts. I’ve never been into listening to talk radio and have little interest in trying to imitate it. However, I quite like what the Sports Guy’s podcasts have evolved into, so I can see some value in doing something similar, talking to a rotating group of reliably entertaining individuals.

The White Buffalo, in particular, would soon be an Internet superstar.

Anyhow, what are some of the subjects you’d be interested in hearing discussed, and who are some of the people you’d be interested in hearing me speak with about them? I’m not saying I’ll do it, I’m just kicking some ideas around.
content_text:
I’m really not enamored of the serious one-man podcasts.  I’ve never been into listening to talk radio and have little interest in trying to imitate it.  However, I quite like what the Sports Guy’s podcasts have evolved into, so I can see some value in doing something similar, talking to a rotating group of reliably entertaining individuals.
The White Buffalo, in particular, would soon be an Internet superstar.
Anyhow, what are some of the subjects you’d be interested in hearing discussed, and who are some of the people you’d be interested in hearing me speak with about them?  I’m not saying I’ll do it, I’m just kicking some ideas around.
